attributes.action: Ensure that Local Authorities Adopt all private sewers in public highways and public land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently unadopted sewers in public highways can leak sewage underground, or manhole lids can leak overflowing sewage onto the highway, with no one willing to be responsible for action.  This can cause a serious health hazard.  
Leaks below ground can eventually cause subsidence and possible highway collapse.
